attributes.action: Install traffic calming when setting 20 mph speed limits.
attributes.additional_details: I urge the D f T to reveiw the foolish way it has allowed local Aurthorities to set 20 mph speed limits without traffic calming. Evidence clearly shows that signage alone will NOT slow drivers, thus putting lives at risk. Speed limits within residential areas have to be enforced, not advised, as Government stastistics CLEARLY show that most drivers have little hazard awareness whilst driving. PLEASE SLOW DOWN AND SAVE SOMEONES LIFE.

rejection.details: Decisions about what traffic calming to install in 20mph areas is a a matter for the local authority, depending on local circumstances.
